about_the_game:
Pixel Pirates is an action-adventure game where you'll take on the role of the reluctant hero, James Flint.

The cursed Captain Blackwood has unleashed chaos in his pursuit for power, and it’s up to you to rise to stop him. Battle creatures and fearsome pirates on land and sea, explore and uncover secrets across handcrafted islands, collect unique items, seek treasure, and embark on a thrilling quest to save the world — all in this byte-sized, swashbuckling adventure.

Features:

  • Exploration  –  Set sail into the unknown, travel to other islands, avoid hazards on the water, and discover ancient mysteries.

  • Land Combat  –  Duel skeleton pirates, crabs, and sea urchins (with more enemy types in the works!).

  • Naval Combat  – Fire your cannons against opposition, and break apart Blackwood's defenses one piece at a time.

  • Treasure Hunts & Puzzles  –  Discover tools that grant you new abilities, uncover and decode cryptic riddles, and platform your way to treasure!

  • Ship Upgrades & Customization –  Upgrade your ship with stronger sails that will increase your ship's speed, reinforce your hull to take less damage, or simply purchase from a set of flags to personalize your look.

  • Quests - Accept and complete quests to move the story forward.

  • Trading – Find and trade with merchants to give you an edge in combat, or simply resupply.

  • Pirate's Gambit - Play a turn-based strategy minigame called Pirate's Gambit, where you'll perform various actions to attack or defend, using your stamina as a resource.

Will you rise to the challenge and put an end to Captain Blackwood’s reign of terror?

Or will you become just another shipwreck in the tide?

Prepare to set sail. Adventure awaits!
